charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived at the beach
after following the sounds of a Pokémon cry and
someone’s laughter.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1101_02:
And then out of nowhere, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was splashed by
ocean spray!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_03:
Oh, dear me. Dragalge, you shouldn’t soak people
by surprise.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_04:
You need to properly greet them first, like in a
Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_05:
I’m sorry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. It seems
Dragalge is feeling very playful.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_06:
We just finished up some battles with other
sync pairs.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_07:
I think she got excited after beating a strong
opponent...
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_08: So I had her go for a swim to cool down a bit.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_0401_10:
Right? What’s more, watching Dragalge float
merrily along in the ocean is so charming!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_0402_12: Hehe. Dragalge seems to enjoy it as well!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_13:
I had plenty of fun in Kalos, of course, but Pasio
has given me whole new experiences!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_14:
In Kalos, I’m part of the Elite Four. I have to wait
for challengers to come to me.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_15:
But here, I can ask any sync pair I please to play
with me.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_16:
With so many sync pairs to battle, Dragalge will
get stronger every day!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_17:
Oh, goodness! It seems Dragalge wants to battle
you, too.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_18:
You and your Pokémon are strong, aren’t you.
My! Quite stronger than most, I’d say! That’s why
Dragalge may think of you as a rival.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_19:
Truthfully, I’m quite interested in you and your
Pokémon as well.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_0401_21: Yes. Playing with you and your Pokémon is so fun!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_0402_23:
Because you and your Pokémon are simply
charming!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_24:
If you want your partner Pokémon to grow
stronger, you need a rival, right?
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_25:
Being on the same team and helping each other
is important, too, but I want someone who can
challenge us and push us to our limits.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_26:
That’s why I’d like you to keep on playing
with Dragalge.
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_0401_28:
Oh, goodness! You’re certainly fired up,
aren’t you!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_0302_29: OK, but take it easy on me!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_0402_30:
Oh, goodness! How modest! But she won’t
hold back!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_31:
My goodness, Dragalge. I told you NOT to spray
people by surprise, didn’t I?
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_32:
*chuckle* I’m sure she’s saying she wants to cool
off in the water with you!
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_33:
Why don’t you and your Pokémon come play in the
ocean with us?
charaepi_ch0155_00_dracaena/2301_1201_34:
After we’re all refreshed, we can have ourselves
a Pokémon battle!
